name: Protos Magos
description:
Protos Magos is a Spellcrafting FPS with fast-paced combat. Explore a medieval setting and blast your way through a horde of demons.

Combine runes in multiple ways to create custom spells. Each rune gives unique properties that change the behavior of the spell. Depending on the runes combined each spell has a different behavior that suits your unique play style

Fireballs. Earth spikes. Toxic pools. Castles. Graveyards. Customizable spells. Demons! Lots and lots of demons.

First. Person. Shooter.
